subject: Re: Little Scribblers Blogs check/upload
preview: Oh all good, just hold off

full_threads.body: Oh all good, just hold off

Hi Dimitri, 

Apologies, no. My understanding was that the launch of the new site was imminent with final reviews being underway.
Oh you did't post them to the existing site and then migrate?

HI Dimitri, 

Confirming the dates have been adjusted. To clarify, these blogs are on the Little Scribblers staging URL https://littlescribblers.wolfiq.cloud/ which means they will be live once the website is live.

Hi Guys,

Please publish all the blogs and space them out by 2 weeks each blog going back to mid 2023 if you have too. Please get these live ASAP.

Thanks,
Dimitri

Hi Dimitri, 

Great news, the supplied blogs have been added to the new Little Scribblers website. 

Note 1 - some images from Adobe Stock were not found in ShutterStock. This only affected a handful of blogs. We chose closely matched image were appropriate. Please feel free to have your team supply ShutterStock images for us to use. Here is the link: https://www.shutterstock.com/

Note 2 - at present, all new blogs have the same publish date (29th and 30th May). We checked the old website to see if there was a pattern we could follow - e.g. 1 or 2 per week but the publish date doesn't show on the website. 

Please advise on the publish frequency and we'll update these prior to launch. 

Below is an audit just for reference:

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath & Team,

Can we please check to see if these attached blogs have in fact been loaded onto the site https://www.littlescribblers.com.au/ and if not, please upload immediately.

Thanks,
Dimitri
